## Fields

| Name      | Label | Type | Description |
| :-------- | :---- | :--: | :---------- | 
| Help_Text__c | Help Text | Text | undefined |
| Order__c | Order | Number | undefined |
| QA_Question_Info__c | QA Question Info | MasterDetail | undefined |
| Quality_Assurance_QA__c | Quality Assurance (QA) | MasterDetail | undefined |
| Question_Score__c | Question Score | Percent | The percentage of the question's "value" earned.  As in, if a question has the value of 20 and its scored at 20, this would be 100% |
| Result__c | Result | Text | Question answers are recorded here.  Used to score questions, and how they appear in UI.  Used for both Checkbox and Standard questions |
| Score__c | Score | Number | The question's score as a raw number.  The maximum total score of all questions under a form is 100 |
| Type__c | Type | Text | undefined |
